channel.title: Fluentd on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Fluentd on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Use Python program with fluentd's exec Output Plugin
item.description: It's been a week since I started using it in battle, but fluentd is very convenient. Then try passing data to the Python program with exec Output Plugin. Startup command Here is a Python example from docs: <match fizzbuzz> type exec command python /path/to/fizzbuzz.py buffer_path /path/to/buffer_path format tsv keys fizzbuzz flush_interval 5s # for debugging/checking </match> However, when actually using it, I wanted to specify the Python put in virtualenv, and there was a question that what happened to PYTHONPATH, so I tried specifying command like this.
